verses.verse: Wherefore, <WG3606> holy <WG40> brethren, <WG80> partakers <WG3353> of the heavenly <WG2032> calling, <WG2821> consider <WG2657> the <WG3588> Apostle <WG652> and <WG2532> High Priest <WG749> of our <WG2257> profession, <WG3671> Christ <WG5547> Jesus; <WG2424>
Who was <WG5607> faithful <WG4103> to him that appointed <WG4160> him, <WG846> as <WG5613> also <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> was faithful in <WG1722> all <WG3650> his <WG846> house. <WG3624>

For <WG1063> this <WG3778> man was counted worthy <WG515> of more <WG4119> glory <WG1391> than <WG3844> Moses, <WG3475> inasmuch <WG2596> <WG3745> as he who hath builded <WG2680> the house <WG846> hath <WG2192> more <WG4119> honor <WG5092> than the <WG3588> house. <WG3624>
For <WG1063> every <WG3956> house <WG3624> is builded <WG2680> by <WG5259> some <WG5100> man; but <WG1161> he that built <WG2680> all things <WG3956> is God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> verily <WG3303> was faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> all <WG3650> his <WG846> house, <WG3624> as <WG5613> a servant, <WG2324> for <WG1519> a testimony <WG3142> of those things which were to be spoken after; <WG2980>

But <WG1161> Christ <WG5547> as <WG5613> a son <WG5207> over <WG1909> his own <WG848> house; <WG3624> whose <WG3739> house <WG3624> are <WG2070> we, <WG2249> if <WG1437> <WG4007> we hold fast <WG2722> the <WG3588> confidence <WG3954> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> rejoicing <WG2745> of the <WG3588> hope <WG1680> firm <WG949> unto <WG3360> the end. <WG5056>
Wherefore <WG1352> (as <WG2531> the <WG3588> Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> saith, <WG3004> Today <WG4594> if <WG1437> ye will hear <WG191> his <WG846> voice, <WG5456>

Harden <WG4645> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> hearts, <WG2588> as <WG5613> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> provocation, <WG3894> in <WG2596> the <WG3588> day <WG2250> of temptation <WG3986> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> wilderness: <WG2048>
When <WG3757> your <WG5216> fathers <WG3962> tempted <WG3985> me, <WG3165> proved <WG1381> me, <WG3165> and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> my <WG3450> works <WG2041> forty <WG5062> years. <WG2094>

Wherefore <WG1352> I was grieved <WG4360> with that <WG1565> generation, <WG1074> and <WG2532> said, <WG2036> They do always <WG104> err <WG4105> in their heart; <WG2588> and <WG1161> they <WG846> have not <WG3756> known <WG1097> my <WG3450> ways. <WG3598>
So <WG5613> I swore <WG3660> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> wrath, <WG3709> They <WG1487> shall not enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> my <WG3450> rest.) <WG2663>

Take heed, <WG991> brethren, <WG80> lest <WG3379> there be <WG2071> in <WG1722> any <WG5100> of you <WG5216> an evil <WG4190> heart <WG2588> of unbelief, <WG570> in departing <WG868> from <WG575> the living <WG2198> God. <WG2316>

But <WG235> exhort <WG3870> one another <WG1438> daily, <WG2596> <WG1538> <WG2250> while <WG891> <WG3757> it <WG3588> is called <WG2564> Today; <WG4594> lest <WG3363> any <WG5100> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> be hardened <WG4645> through the deceitfulness <WG539> of sin. <WG266>

For <WG1063> we are made <WG1096> partakers <WG3353> of Christ, <WG5547> if <WG1437> <WG4007> we hold <WG2722> the <WG3588> beginning <WG746> of our confidence <WG5287> steadfast <WG949> unto <WG3360> the end; <WG5056>

While it is said, <WG3004> Today <WG4594> if <WG1437> ye will hear <WG191> his <WG846> voice, <WG5456> harden <WG4645> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> hearts, <WG2588> as <WG5613> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> provocation. <WG3894>
For <WG1063> some, <WG5100> when they had heard, <WG191> did provoke: <WG3893> howbeit <WG235> not <WG3756> all <WG3956> that came <WG1831> out of <WG1537> Egypt <WG125> by <WG1223> Moses. <WG3475>

But <WG1161> with whom <WG5101> was he grieved <WG4360> forty <WG5062> years? <WG2094> was it not <WG3780> with them that had sinned, <WG264> whose <WG3739> carcasses <WG2966> fell <WG4098> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> wilderness? <WG2048>
And <WG1161> to whom <WG5101> swore <WG3660> he that they should not <WG3361> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> his <WG848> rest, <WG2663> but <WG1508> to them that believed not? <WG544>
So <WG2532> we see <WG991> that <WG3754> they could <WG1410> not <WG3756> enter in <WG1525> because <WG1223> of unbelief. <WG570>
